metadata.title: CVE-2024-31949 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In FRRouting (FRR) through 9.1, an infinite loop can occur when receiving aMP/GR capability as a dynamic capability because malformed data results ina pointer not advancing.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-31949` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

frr - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu5
frr-pythontools - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu5
frr-rpki-rtrlib - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu5
frr-snmp - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: frr package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.4.4-1.1ubuntu5').
